title: The Suitcase Game, Pence Prays Pandemic Away 2.28.20
itunes:title: The Suitcase Game, Pence Prays Pandemic Away 2.28.20
description:
In episode 579, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Daniel Van Kirk to discuss a check in with Florida woman, the Trump administrations plan for combatting coronavirus, Democratic leaders willing to risk it all, Mike Bloomberg's history of dealing with emergencies, the end of beards, Amazon's new grocery store, the coolest websites, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Florida Woman Arrested for Killing Her Boyfriend By Leaving Him in a Suitcase
  2. Mike Pence Is Your New Czar Of Finding Out If Coronavirus Is Gay, Praying It Away
  3. White House GAGS government health experts from speaking about coronavirus saying they must have Mike Pence's approval for EVERYTHING they say about mounting crisis - despite VP having zero medical qualifications
  4. Coronavirus Patient in California Was Not Tested for Days
  5. Trump Administration Can’t Promise You’ll Be Able To Afford Coronavirus Vaccine
  6. Here's the clip of Azar not assuring Rep. Schakowsky a covid-19 vaccine will be affordable to all.
  7. Democratic Leaders Willing to Risk Party Damage to Stop Bernie Sanders
  8. Mayor Bloomberg under fire for handling of blizzard
  9. New York Struggles as Blizzard’s Impact Chastens Bloomberg
  10. NYC Mayor Bloomberg Criticized for Storm Response
  11. Bloomberg Team on Blizzard Response: We’re Sorry! (But It’s Not Our Fault.)
  12. As coronavirus spreads, the CDC has a very thorough guide to optimizing your facial hair for a mask
  13. Amazon opens full-sized, cashierless grocery store, fulfilling unclear human need
  14. What is the coolest website you’ve visited that no one knows about?
  15. Steve Lacy - Playground (Official Video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
